AlreadyHasAllowance().details: Thrown if trying to set allowance bigger than 0 when user has allowance, set allowance to 0 first if you want to set specific value

AlreadyZero().details: Thrown if trying to set allowance to 0 when it's already 0

AmountEqualZero().details: Thrown if trying to add 0 allowance or grant 0 datacap

FunctionDisabled().details: Thrown if trying to call disabled function

InsufficientAllowance().details: Thrown if caller doesn't have enough allowance for given action

addVerifiedClient(bytes,uint256).details: Emits DatacapAllocated eventReverts with InsufficientAllowance if caller doesn't have sufficient allowance

DatacapAllocated(address,bytes,uint256).notice: Emitted when datacap is granted to a client

@title Interface for Allocator contract
 @notice Definition of core functions and events of the Allocator contract
@dev Thrown if caller doesn't have enough allowance for given action
@dev Thrown if trying to add 0 allowance or grant 0 datacap
@dev Thrown if trying to set allowance bigger than 0 when user has allowance, set allowance to 0 first if you want to set specific value
@dev Thrown if trying to set allowance to 0 when it's already 0
@dev Thrown if trying to call disabled function
